00007 -(NSArray *)collect:(NSArray *)views {
00008         NSMutableArray *array = [NSMutableArray array];
00009         for (UIView *view in views) {
00010                 for (UIView *subView in view.subviews) {
00011                         [array addObject:subView];

00013         }
00014         return array;
00015 }
